function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Large-scale research and development efforts for vaccines and treatments","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Studying patients with covid-19, including those with a direct link to the epicenter, poses a risk of exposure to the virus for the researchers.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission of disease from birds to humans","category":"Health","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Vulnerability of young and healthy individuals to h1n1 virus","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Continued evolution and mutation of influenza viruses","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Factory shutdowns impacting automobile production","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive impact on aviation industry due to travel bans","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decrease in demand for new aircraft purchases","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Drastic decline in global oil demand due to shutdown of international and domestic passenger aircraft","category":"Economic","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Severe disruptions and delays in construction projects due to workforce unable to work as a result of stringent self-quarantine guidelines.","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on construction sector leading to a drop in fixed asset investment and real estate development.","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Impact of covid-19 on the food industry, including closure of restaurants, cafes, and luxury food service providers, and difficulty meeting rising demands due to panic buying.","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Shortage of ventilators, icus, and ppe in hospitals","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Massive drop in share prices of telecommunications companies","category":"Economic","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient number of testing kits leading to infeasibility of large-scale covid-19 testing.","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Absence of large scale testing for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate access to accurate covid-19 tests","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"False negative results in naat testing due to targeting a single gene","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inability of serological tests to detect early-stage infection","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity in diagnosing past infections with naat and serological tests","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"No definitive treatment or preventive vaccine for the coronavirus","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Treatment of covid-19 is mostly symptomatic","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Patients with mild covid-19 symptoms managed at home","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Virus mutation challenges vaccine development","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long timeline for commercial release of vaccines","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential failure of vaccine efficacy in later clinical trials","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Cytokine bursts caused by vaccine leading to acute respiratory distress syndrome ards","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Need for multiple doses of covid-19 vaccine","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Use of unapproved drugs for covid-19 treatment","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of conclusive evidence for the effectiveness of shl oral liquid against covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Delay in the development of a commercially viable vaccine for covid-19","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate implementation of preventive measures recommended by who and cdc","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Failure to disinfect frequently touched surfaces","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate use and disposal of masks","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Potential security and privacy risks in the use of digital technologies","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of iot tools may lead to privacy concerns due to data collection","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on iot tools for disease monitoring may lead to false alarms or missed cases","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorrect interpretation of iot data may lead to misinformed decision-making","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Hazardous exposure to disinfectant chemicals due to drone spraying","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of technological failure leading to delay in delivery of medical supplies","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Beyond visible line of sight bvlos drone operations remain somewhat unsafe, requiring technological and operational guidelines for safe operations.","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Uavs face constraints in terms of battery life and load capacity, inhibiting their capability to cover long distances and make multiple deliveries at once.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contaminated surfaces in hospitals and healthcare settings","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of the biosensor patches may lead to potential disease spread.","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on a single device for remote health monitoring","category":"Health","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Concerns about the battery life of smart wearables","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Privacy concerns related to contact tracing apps","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Issues of accuracy and reliability in contact tracing apps","category":"Technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate disease surveillance and forecasting","category":"Health","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of ai-based multisensory technology for covid-19 screening may raise privacy and data security concerns for individuals being scanned.","category":"Technology","confidence":"High"}]}
